title: Daily Horoscope Watch Face
summary: Your personalized daily horoscope is ready waiting for you on your smart watch.
developerAddress:

description: No matter how many life ostacles you had to overcome in recent months, one thing is certain - your future is bright. Take a coffee break, your personalized daily horoscope is ready waiting for you on your smart watch. Start making plans and living your confident life.Multiple customization options:- analog and digital watch,- 2 background colors,- battery life indicator.Designed for Android Wear.Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
descriptionHTML:
No matter how many life ostacles you had to overcome in recent months, one thing is certain - your future is bright. Take a coffee break, your personalized daily horoscope is ready waiting for you on your smart watch. Start making plans and living your confident life.

Multiple customization options:
- analog and digital watch,
- 2 background colors,
- battery life indicator.

Designed for Android Wear.
Supported smartwatches: LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Motorola Moto 360, Sony SmartWatch 3, Asus ZenWatch, Samsung Gear Live.
comments: Not working on Moto 360 No option to save birthday and other settings.  Cannot select watchface on Moto360
It never worked on my note 5.
